EMAILTEMPLATE:
Dear User,

An error has been detected. This has resulted the interface to SAP system to fail.

Please ensure that the open period is the same between ITAS & SAP.

Kindly take necessary action for this transaction.

If you are not sure, kindly discuss with your superior or team coordinator for guidance.

For technical assistance, please contact wil-itsupport-packaged@wilmar.com.sg.

This is a system generated email. Please do not reply using this email.
TRIGGERCONDITION:
%dw 1.0
%output application/java
---
(flowVars.errorEvent.errorTitle contains "Posting period") and (flowVars.errorEvent.errorTitle contains "is not open") and ((upper flowVars.inboundMessage.messageContent.MessageBody.InnerBody.TradingEntity) == "WST")

RECIPIENTCC: jeffrey.liwanag@sg.wilmar-intl.com, erwin.sinaga@id.wilmar-intl.com, vellyna.sitorus@id.wilmar-intl.com, arie.triwiyono@id.wilmar-intl.com, willian.tama@id.wilmar-intl.com, anugrah.perdana@id.wilmar-intl.com, joshua.hanayong@id.wilmar-intl.com, jay.silen@id.wilmar-intl.com, frederik.pakpahan@id.wilmar-intl.com
EMAILTEMPLATE:
Dear User,

An error has been detected. This has resulted the interface to SAP system to fail.

SAP Document Reversal failed to process as it already contains cleared items.

Kindly take necessary action for this invoice.

If you are not sure, kindly discuss with your superior or team coordinator for guidance.

For technical assistance, please contact wil-itsupport-packaged@wilmar.com.sg.

This is a system generated email. Please do not reply using this email.
TRIGGERCONDITION:
%dw 1.0
%output application/java
---
(flowVars.errorEvent.errorTitle contains "SAP Document REV Post failed to process") and (flowVars.errorEvent.errorTitle contains "already contains cleared items") and ((upper flowVars.inboundMessage.messageContent.MessageBody.InnerBody.TradingEntity) == "WS")
